name: 邱家吉
objective: 本課程主要介紹工程應用上常使用的數學方法，透過模擬解題與詮釋，使學生理解如何運用數學工具解決工程問題。課程內容包括(1)常微分方程式級數解、(2)向量微積分、(3)傅立葉分析、(4)偏微分方程式等章節，訓練同學在理論，計算及實驗間建立正確的認知及意義。
schedule:
Week 1 Power series method
Week 2 Legendre’s equation
Week 3 Bessel equation
Week 4 Inner product and vector product
Week 5 Gradient, divergence, curl
Week 6 Line integrals and surface integrals
Week 7 1st midterm exam (4/2 holiday)
Week 8 Fourier series
Week 9 Arbitrary period, even and odd function, half-range expansions
Week 10 Strum-Liouville problems, 
Week 11 Fourier Integral
Week 12 Fourier Transform
Week 13 2nd Midterm exam
Week 14 Basic concepts of PDEs
Week 15 Solution by separating variables
Week 16 Heat equation
Week 17 P.D.E. of Laplace
Week 18 Final exam
scorePolicy: 第一次期中考 (20%)、第二次期中考 (20%)、期末考 (30%)、作業 (20%)、出缺席與平時表現 (10%)
materials: Kreyszig, E. (2011): Advanced engineering mathematics, 10th edition.
